## Source: ossf-package-analysis (acf5942d718fc2e6daba71b8b9b451481c4ceeee231d333d35695c9b326bc57a)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@wix-platform/velo-multilingual-helper-backend' @ 100.100.106 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
